item.title: What is Honduras ex-president accused of and why has Trump pardoned him?
item.description: Juan Orlando Hern√°ndez, once called the key figure in a drug trafficking scheme that flooded America with over 400 tonnes of cocaine, walks free after...

item.title: Why is Trump threatening Venezuela's Maduro?
item.description: We look at what is behind the deployment of a large US military force to within striking distance of Venezuela.

item.title: Ukrainians in war-ravaged Donbas weigh prospects of peace deal
item.description: While many Ukrainians believe they have sacrificed too much for their country to lose territory to Russia, others are desperate for the war to end.

item.title: Nigeria grants asylum to Guinea-Bissau presidential candidate after coup
item.description: Nigeria says it is sheltering Fernando Dias in its embassy in Bissau, citing an imminent threat to his life.

item.title: Pope prays at Beirut port blast site on last day of Lebanon visit
item.description: Pope Leo XIV demanded justice for the more than 200 victims of the disaster, at the end of his three-day visit to Lebanon.
